H0.text: Which actor played the father of the Waltons children. Richard Thomas

H1.text: Which actor played the father of the Waltons children. Michael Learned

H2.text: Which actor played the father of the Waltons children. Will Geer

H3.text: Which actor played the father of the Waltons children. Ralph Waite

A4.text: He was cast as Zebulon Walton, the family patriarch on The Waltons.

A5.text: John Walton Sr. (Ralph Waite, seasons 1–8, 8 episodes of season 9 and all movie sequels), the family patriarch.
